meanings.definition: The state or condition of being a gangster.
meanings.sent1: In gangsterdom, one must always watch their back for rivals.
meanings.sent2: The police were determined to eradicate gangsterdom from the city.
meanings.sent3: Despite his small stature, he ruled over gangsterdom with an iron fist.
meanings.sent4: The dark alleys of the city whispered tales of gangsterdom.
meanings.sent5: The allure of gangsterdom drew in many young individuals seeking power.

meanings.definition: The activities, behavior, or characteristics associated with being a gangster.
meanings.sent1: The flashy cars and expensive suits were symbols of gangsterdom.
meanings.sent2: His involvement in gangsterdom led to his eventual downfall.
meanings.sent3: Even in the world of make-believe, his gangsterdom stood out.
meanings.sent4: She navigated the treacherous waters of gangsterdom with finesse.
meanings.sent5: The movie portrayed a glamorous version of gangsterdom, far from reality.
